title: Describing a panic attack
context: Tell a doctor or friend that your chest was tight and you could not breathe.

content.bestLine: My chest was tight and I couldn't breathe

neutral.text: I felt like I was suffocating
I had trouble catching my breath
I felt a heavy weight on my chest

informal.text: I was freaking out and couldn't breathe
I felt like I was going to pass out
I was having a major panic attack
My heart was racing and I couldn't breathe
I felt like I was losing control

formal.text: I experienced a sudden onset of dyspnea
My chest felt constricted and I had difficulty breathing
I suffered from a panic attack with respiratory distress
I had a severe anxiety episode with breathing difficulties
My breathing became labored and I felt anxious
I experienced a sudden and intense fear response with respiratory symptoms

patterns.template: My chest felt [options] and I couldn't breathe
I was having a [options] attack and couldn't catch my breath
